DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to compare the value of contrast medium enhanced post mortem CT to classic autopsy.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Contrast Medium Enhanced Post-mortem CT in Virtual Autopsy
DOC.criteria: Patients dying in the ICU age >18y relatives refusing to participation in the study
DOC.keyword: contrast medium enhanced post mortem CT
To evaluate the value of contrast medium enhanced post-mortem CT in virtual autopsy focussing on thromboembolic and vascular conditions
